text: Pagans diysno ye tsey khto kazhutʹ shcho BOH yavlyaye soboyu Messiah, syn Mary. Skazhitʹ, "Khto mih protystavyty BOHA yakshcho Vin willed vynyshchyty Messiah, syna Mary, ta yoho maty, ta kozhnyy na zemli?" Do BOHA nalezhytʹ suverenitetu neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy. Vin stvoryuye shchob ni Vin wills. BOH Omnipotent
